title: Going Off the Deep End
author: Kueh Wee Rock
summary: In university, there is an absence of short term goals. You know you have to do something, but what?

title: Entrepreneurship from Scratch
author: Kueh Wee Rock
summary: Growing your own lemons when life gives you none.

title: Depression at University
author: Kueh Wee Rock
summary: A lot of students suffer from it, from what I’ve seen.

title: [FULL] Conversations with Wee Rock
author: Kueh Wee Rock
summary: Driven, ambitious and proactive, he not only engaged in scholarly pursuits at Imperial but also used his time in university to explore several interests outside of academia, including starting a business.

title: Teaching Quality at Imperial
author: Nicholas Oon
summary: I think they could connect better with students and be more passionate about presenting their knowledge.

title: Studying the Wrong Course?
author: Nicholas Oon
summary: Post-uni, I’m interested in Biology and Chemistry but I’m not going to pursue them as a career.

title: Network = Networth
author: Nicholas Oon
summary: It's the extracurricular activities and the people you meet that determine the worth of your time.

title: [FULL] Conversations with Nicholas Oon
author: Nicholas Oon
summary: A very passionate person with a gift for giving inspirational speeches and has a very good grasp of conceptual matters.

title: Relentless optimism
author: Chan Jun Shern
summary: In psychology class, they teach you about self-fulfilling prophecies. The part they usually leave out? You can use it as a tool.
